author: kkolinko
msg: Do not assign an empty array to this field, neither when creating a new versions list, nor when removing the last version from it. The mapping algorithm does not expect this list to be empty. Mark the versions list field as volatile, because it is updated when a Context is started or stopped.
This backports r1604435 and a bit from r1604320 and r1604928.
